message: Anyone interested in voting this feature request up a bit?
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: TypeScript - typescript - View Issue #76: A compiler flag to write code to output stream not file
caption: typescript.codeplex.com
description: This will be very useful for automating the compiler from an asset management / bundling code without having to write to intermediate files.So, if the compiler can output to console, any process that calls the compiler can then redirect the standard output stream when calling the compiler and use th...
